REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f8554 reute r f BC-CRAFTMATIC/CONTOUR-<C 03-18 0051

TEXT.TITLE: CRAFTMATIC/CONTOUR <CRCC> SEES HIGHER PROFITS
TEXT.BODY: Craftmatic/Contour Industries Inc said it would report substantial profits for the first quarter of fiscal 1987 ending March 31. The company recorded net income of 732,000 dlrs, or 22 cts per share, on revenues of 10.2 mln dlrs. Reuter
